Select cases based on ICD code and the number of ICD codes

selectCases.Rd

This can be used to select qualified cases from factIcd data based on the ICD code searching criteria and number of ICD code per patients in the inout factIcd dataset. Return qualified Members' data

selectCases(DxDataFile, idColName, icdColName, dateColName, icd10usingDate,
  groupDataType = ICD, CustomGroupingTable, isDescription = TRUE,
  caseCondition, caseCount, INRofDayRange = c(30, 365),
  selectCaseType = "Selected")

Arguments

DxDataFile

A file of clinical diagnostic data with at least 3 columns: "MemberID","ICD", "Date"
idColName

A column for MemberID of DxDataFile
icdColName

A column for ICD of DxDataFile
dateColName

A column for Date of DxDataFile
icd10usingDate

Icd 10 using date
groupDataType

Four Stratified methods can be chosen: CCS ('ccs'), CCS levels ('ccslvl1', 'ccslvl2', 'ccslvl3', 'ccslvl4'), PheWAS ('PheWAS'), comorbidities ('ahrq','charlson', 'elix'), grepICD or customICD ('customGrepIcdGroup', 'customIcdGroup'). Change it to any of the other possible variables, default it is set to "ccs".
CustomGroupingTable

Table is for groupDataType
isDescription

CCS/PheWAS categories or description for ICD-CM codes, default is 'TRUE'.
caseCondition

ICD selection rules with grepl expression
caseCount

a threshold of number of ICD for case selection
INRofDayRange

Determines the interval of days of interest for performing the case selection. By default it is set from 30 to 365 days.
selectCaseType

Aggregation of selected cases name. By default it is set to "selected".

Examples

head(sampleDxFile)
#>    ID    ICD       Date
#> 1:  C  553.3 2008-04-03
#> 2:  A  553.3 2008-05-01
#> 3:  A 553.20 2009-02-23
#> 4:  B 553.20 2007-08-29
#> 5:  A  553.3 2008-06-27
#> 6:  B  K44.9 2019-11-10
selectCases(DxDataFile = sampleDxFile,
            ID, ICD, Date,
            groupDataType = ccslvl2,
            icd10usingDate = "2015/10/01",
            caseCondition = "Diseases of the heart",
            caseCount = 2)
#> Wrong ICD format: total 9 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("A0.11 (20)", "E114 (8)", "Z9.90 (6)", "F42 (6)", "001 (5)", "75.52 (4)", "755.2 (3)", "123.45 (3)", "7552 (2)")
#> 	
#> Wrong ICD version: total 7 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("V27.0 (18)", "A01.05 (8)", "42761 (7)", "V24.1 (6)", "A0105 (5)", "E03.0 (4)", "650 (4)")
#> 	
#> Warning: The ICD mentioned above matches to "NA" due to the format or other issues.
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD format" means the ICD has wrong format
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD version" means the ICD classify to wrong ICD version (cause the "icd10usingDate" or other issues)
#>    ID selectedCase count firstCaseDate endCaseDate period MostCommonICD
#> 1:  A     Selected     4    2021-08-02  2022-02-20    202        I48.91
#> 2:  B     Selected     4    2007-07-16  2009-02-25    348        427.31
#> 3:  C     Selected     6    2007-06-20  2009-02-08    255        427.31
#> 4:  D  nonSelected    NA          <NA>        <NA>     NA          <NA>
#>    MostCommonICDCount
#> 1:                  4
#> 2:                  3
#> 3:                  3
#> 4:                 NA
